Basement

Since everyone is gone, we're locking up and leaving this place.
There's only blueprints and interior in this room. Frida has the key.
Signed: Frank
I don't care if you're getting seeds or storing produce.\STAY AWAY from the critters.
They WILL grab you if you get too close.
Signed: Frank
Fren's treehouse.
The wood in this area is unique. Sturdy and pale.\nI will bring some to the new place.
I used it for the bed. I can make a blueprint, so do not take it.
It was really hard to get up here.
A list of names. All stricken through, except for the last one.
Grow-Good Veggies\nGrow-Good Farm
Big Growth Farm\nVeggies from the rift
Riftwood Farm
Hello!\nAre you new?
I thought we stopped getting new people.\nI can be your supervisor, I guess.
Everything here is probably all new for you, so let's start with something simple.
Take this seed, plant it, and come back to me with the crop.
I gave you a seed. Plant it, and wait for it to grow.
Bring me the crop once it has fully grown.
Excellent!\nLooks like you will be good at this in no time.
We used to store seeds down in the basement.\nHere is the key.
We used to store seeds down in the basement.
The crops will grow while you're down there so go collect more seeds.
Good job!\nLooks like you are ready.
Now you must destroy the holy tree, at the old burial grounds. Everyone who used to work here were killed by its worshippers.
Only a special weapon will do. A sword of forged from a crystal mold.
Good luck!
The holy tree grows inside a building in the forest past the basement.
Only a special sword forged from a crystal mold can cut into the core of the holy tree.
You must forge the sword, then slay the tree.
Have you run into any obstructions?
I'm sure you've noticed that plants, among other things, grow quite large.
If you can't remove them by hand, try looking for a tool in the old workshop, down there.
You found the mine? That's great! We need those crystals in order to craft the sword mold.
Unfortunately, rocks don't pop open and spit out their innards if you ask them nicely.
There must be a pickaxe left behind down there, after they all left.
I never liked the forge in the mines. Someone else was assigned to those, not me.
I remember they were carrying coal for the furnace, try that.
So you've seen the holy tree. Did you reach the core?
Just jump in the hole, we do it all the time. It's easy to climb out again.
Woah, you're looking worse for wear.\nYou alright?
Listen, most things down there don't want nothing to do with you. Try to keep your distance.
